title: Have no friends that play league :(
body:
Hi, 
Im stetsonshark. I've been playing league for awhile now, but got bored with it for no other reason than I don't have any friends that play the game.
Im looking for a few casual players to game with. I don't play ranked anymore, so mostly just normals drafts or blind pick and mostly play top but don't really care what role I play. Im on the east coast if that has an impact on anything.
